channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump returns to power after unprecedented comeback, emboldened to reshape American institutions
item.description: Donald Trump has been sworn in as the 47th president. He is promising a “revolution of common sense” and taking charge as Republicans assume unified control of Washington and set out to reshape the country’s institutions.

item.title: Biden pardons Fauci, Milley and the Jan. 6 committee in effort to guard against ‘revenge’ by Trump
Fire-ravaged Southern California braces for gusty winds and heightened wildfire risk
